com.francisli.processing.http
Class HttpResponse

java.lang.Object
  com.francisli.processing.http.HttpResponse

public class HttpResponse
extends Object

An HttpResponse object contains both status information and the content of the response to an HTTP request.

This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, version 3.

This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA

Author:
Francis Li

Field Summary
 byte[] content
          The raw data content of the response
 int contentLength
          The length of the content data, the same as content.length
 String contentType
          The MIME type of the content, including optional character set
 int statusCode
          The integer HTTP status code of this response
 String statusMessage
          A short descriptive text message for the current status
 
Method Summary
 JSONObject getContentAsJSONObject()
          Parses the data as a JSON document and returns it as a JSONObject.
 String getContentAsString()
          Converts the content into a String.
 processing.xml.XMLElement getContentAsXMLElement()
          Parses the data as an XML document and returns an XMLElement object.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

getContentAsString

public String getContentAsString()
Converts the content into a String.

Returns:

getContentAsJSONObject

public JSONObject getContentAsJSONObject()
Parses the data as a JSON document and returns it as a JSONObject.

Returns:
A JSONObject representing the parsed JSON data

getContentAsXMLElement

public processing.xml.XMLElement getContentAsXMLElement()
Parses the data as an XML document and returns an XMLElement object.

Returns:
XMLElement object representing the root of the document
